statements: UPDATE users SET user_name = 'John Doe', playlist_name = 'Favorites' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET playlist_name = 'Top Hits', playlist_songs = '["Song1", "Song2", "Song3"]', user_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'John Doe', playlist_name = 'Favorites' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET playlist_songs = '["Song1", "Song2", "Song3"]', user_name = 'Alice Smith' WHERE playlist_name = 'My Playlist' AND user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET username='new_username' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE playlists SET user_id=2, playlist_name='updated_playlist' WHERE playlist_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE playlists SET playlist_name = 'Updated Playlist Name' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET display_name = 'John Smith' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE playlists SET playlist_description = 'New playlist description' WHERE playlist_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET display_name = 'John Doe', voice_command_enabled = true WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE songs SET artist_name = 'Taylor Swift', duration = 180 WHERE song_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE songs SET duration = INTERVAL '4 minutes', genre = 'Pop' WHERE artist = 'Taylor Swift';
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE songs SET artist = 'John Doe', genre = 'Pop' WHERE song_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c9';
UPDATE Users SET email='newemail@example.com', name='John Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE Playlists SET description='Updated playlist description' WHERE playlist_id=2;
UPDATE Users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE Playlists SET description = 'Updated playlist description', playlist_name = 'New Playlist Name' WHERE playlist_id = 2;
